settings.heading: Adam McKenzie x Spiceology
settings.content: Seventh-generation Colorado native Adam McKenzie created the Instagram channel @ThisJewCanQue to share his love for grilling, smoking and BBQing. His love of pork, beef and all things outdoor cooking has evolved into a robust platform, on which fellow BBQ aficionados have congregated.

settings.heading: About Adam McKenzie
settings.text:
STEM teacher by day, Smoke Junkie by night, Adam McKenzie of @thisjewcanque can really do it all. Not only is he a total Traeger master, but his collection of blends prove that his talents go way beyond the grill.

While wood-fired grills and pellet smokers may sound intimidating, Adam’s cookbook reveals that he’s the king of fast and easy weeknight dinners. Whether you’re craving the Coffee Blend, the Garlic Blend, the Brunch Blend or the Smoke Blend, this line of seasonings has something for everyone. 

He’s become known for his Saturday morning meat slicing videos, some of which have garnered more than 1 million views. Not one to shy away from challenges, Adam is always looking to expand his repertoire and try new things. 

So, are you willing to let this STEM teacher teach you how to smoke? Follow along at @ThisJewCanQue.

Order Adam’s New Cookbook, Weeknight Smoking on Your Traeger and Other Pellet Grills.
